                            </dl>

                      </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                      {comment.displayed.THANK_IMG} {comment.displayed.MULTIQUOTE_IMG} {comment.displayed.QUOTE_IMG} {comment.displayed.EDIT_IMG} {comment.displayed.DELETE_IMG} {comment.displayed.IP_IMG} {comment.displayed.REPORT_IMG}
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div></li>
            <!-- END displayed -->

          <!-- END comment -->
